(My full bio.)

Cryptocurrency Security Guides

A free collection of security awareness resources for users of digital currencies, written by an I.T. security professional and reviewed by peers. The aim of these guides is to help adoption by reducing the risks involved in holding cryptocurrencies by providing guidance for a variety of scenarios all in one place. I hope that you find the guides useful, straightforward, and practical.

See also: Cryptocurrency Security Top 10

Wallet? Seed?: Introductory Concepts and Terms

Coin Storage Safety Guide: Where to Keep Your Coins

Device Security and Antivirus for Coin Owners

Security Guide for Cryptocurrency Exchanges

Moving Coins: How to Safely Transfer, Deposit, and Withdraw

Password Guide: How to Have Both Security and Convenience

How to Avoid Phishing and Other Scams

Security for Cryptocurrency Traders

These guides are open source. Feel free to contribute! If you are not a developer, feel free to contribute by sending clarifying questions and suggestions to: questions@joeyrideout.com

February 25, 2018
